result.title: Periodic TF and Innovation evaluation Report 5
result.description: Database with the information gathered from the surveillance sources defined in the Technology forecasting plan during the last six months. The main fields of each record in the database could include: date, description, source, opportunity/threat, etc.... Some of these records will be marked as “Innovation proposals”. Grades and prioritization list of these proposals evaluated by the innovation committee during the last six months will also be included in the report.
